topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f0c61b6368723f10a51e00#post_54f0c61b6368723f10a51e00
Oh, we played a game where you answer questions and get points for each right answer, I forget the name. 
It was boy vs girls, and the girls freaked out about a question they got wrong, trying to prove they were right.

Then we had a bonus question where we could bet our points. The girls did it wrong.
